Welcome to EVADE’s documentation!¶

This software analyzes binding site dynamics and allostery. It can find the volume of a pocket in an MD trajectory, identify residues at the pocket surface, and study how dihedrals influence each other across the protein. Source code can be found here. To see how to use the code, check the example directory included with the source code.

Contents:

  • Visualizing Proteins and Pockets
  • Troubleshooting
  • List of All Functions
